causes_communes: opponent not attacking deep serves well

debutant.description: serve into opponent's backhand with no spin, making it 'die' on the net
slow serve with spin that breaks a lot

serve with spin that breaks a lot, aiming for opponent's backhand

erreurs_a_eviter.description: serve with maximum speed and deepness
